mapper.sql: r_id, r_date, r_year, r_month, r_week, r_day, r_rank, u_id, r_score, r_extra, r_state
mapper.select:
select
from tb_prank where r_year = #{rYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and r_month=#{rMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by r_score desc

select
from (select
from tb_prank where r_year = #{rYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and r_month=#{rMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by r_score desc) as t limit 10

update tb_prank
r_date = #{rDate,jdbcType=DATE},
r_year = #{rYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r_month = #{rMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
r_week = #{rWeek,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

r_state = #{rState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where r_id = #{rId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
